detectors.description:

private constant DECIMALS = 18; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Based.sol)#112

private constant TOTAL_GONS = MAX_UINT256 - (MAX_UINT256 % INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Based.sol)#116
private constant MAX_SUPPLY = ~uint128(0);  // (2^128) - 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Based.sol)#118
